Package edu.carroll.cs389application.web.controller

Class ImageController

java.lang.Object
edu.carroll.cs389application.web.controller.ImageController
@Controller public class ImageController extends Object
The ImageController class handles all HTTP requests related to images, including uploading, retrieving, and displaying images. It interacts with the ImageService and UserService to perform the necessary operations, such as saving and retrieving images from the database.

  • Field Summary

    Field

  • Method Details

    • handleFileUpload

      @PostMapping("/upload") public String handleFileUpload(@ModelAttribute("fileForm") ImageForm fileForm, @RequestParam("imageFile") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Handles file upload requests.
      Parameters:
      fileForm - the form containing information about the image file
      file - the image file itself
      result - the result of the validation of the image file
      model - the model used to store data to be displayed by the view
      session - the user's session
      Returns:
      the view to display

    • passImages

      private void passImages(org.springframework.ui.Model model, String username)
      Helper method to pass the images to the view. Retrieves the list of image streams for the specified user, converts each image to a base64-encoded string, and adds it to a list of image pairs containing the image source and content type. Finally, adds the list of image pairs to the model attribute "images".
      Parameters:
      model - the model to add the image pairs to
      username - the username of the user to retrieve images for
